name: Hon. Atty. Marsha B. Esturas
title: Vice Mayor
biography: A dedicated legal professional and public servant, Vice Mayor Esturas champions good governance and community welfare. She is known for her meticulous approach to legislation and her commitment to upholding justice.

name: Hon. Caroline O. Portugal
title: Sangguniang Bayan Member
biography: Councilor Portugal is a strong advocate for community development and social services, focusing on programs that uplift vulnerable sectors. Her work emphasizes grassroots empowerment and sustainable community projects.

name: Hon. Abel P. Malaluan, IV
title: Sangguniang Bayan Member
biography: Councilor Malaluan is committed to sustainable development and environmental protection, pushing for policies that ensure a greener Capalonga. He is passionate about preserving natural resources for future generations.

name: Hon. Juan P. Enero
title: Sangguniang Bayan Member
biography: Councilor Enero is a staunch supporter of public health and sanitation, working to improve health services and promote hygiene in all barangays. His medical background provides valuable insight into public health policy.

name: Hon. Elmer M. Malaluan
title: Sangguniang Bayan Member
biography: Councilor Malaluan is focused on infrastructure development and public works, ensuring that Capalonga has reliable and safe public facilities. His engineering expertise is crucial for municipal planning.

name: Hon. Robinson E. Ricasio
title: Sangguniang Bayan Member
biography: Councilor Ricasio is dedicated to education and youth development, striving to provide better learning opportunities and support for the young generation. He believes in nurturing the potential of every student.

name: Hon. Jumaro R. Parale
title: Sangguniang Bayan Member
biography: Councilor Parale is passionate about tourism, culture, and arts, aiming to showcase Capalonga's rich heritage and boost local tourism. He actively promotes cultural preservation and creative industries.

name: Hon. Mariano L. Arguelles
title: Sangguniang Bayan Member
biography: Councilor Arguelles is a champion of good governance and public accountability, ensuring transparency and ethical conduct in local administration. His background in public administration strengthens his advocacy.

name: Hon. Arlene E. Vigonte-Mena
title: Sangguniang Bayan Member
biography: Councilor Vigonte-Mena is a dedicated advocate for women, children, and family welfare, implementing programs that protect and empower them. Her work is rooted in compassion and social justice.

name: Hon. Leslie B. Esturas
title: LNB President
biography: As the LNB President, Hon. Esturas represents the barangays, ensuring their concerns are heard and addressed in the Sangguniang Bayan. She is a strong voice for local communities.

name: Hon. John Ernie M. Talento
title: SK Federation President
biography: Hon. Talento leads the youth sector, promoting youth empowerment, sports development, and active participation in local governance. He is a dynamic leader inspiring the next generation.
